name: Everychimp
description:
Everychimp is a platformer built in Game Maker by HashingSlash.  Most enemies can be defeated by the traditional platformer mechanic of jumping on them. 

Heads up: I attempted to use animals that are able to use tools (macaque monkeys and crows), used colour (black and albino crows) to demonstrate in-grouping/out-grouping and showed encaged monkeys to communicate servitude. While it was not my intention, the symbolism could be 'problematic'.  I wish I could go back and retell this story with different characters but I wish to present this game as it was created.
